com.codepoetics.fluvius.history

Class History

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codepoetics.fluvius.history.History

  • public final class History
extends Object
    Utility class for creating FlowHistoryRepositorys and FlowCompilers that will compile Flows that record FlowEvents to them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> FlowHistoryRepository<T> createInMemoryRepository(EventDataSerialiser<T> serialiser)
      Create an in-memory FlowHistoryRepository using the provided EventDataSerialiser to serialise flow event data.
      static <T> FlowHistoryRepository<T> createRepository(FlowEventRepository<T> eventRepository, TraceMapRepository traceMapRepository)
      Create a FlowHistoryRepository that will write flow event data to the provided FlowEventRepository, and TraceMaps to the provided TraceMapRepository.
      static <T> FlowHistoryRepository<T> createRepository(FlowEventStore<T> eventStore, EventDataSerialiser<T> serialiser, TraceMapRepository traceMapRepository)
      Create a FlowHistoryRepository that will write flow event data serialised with the provided EventDataSerialiser to the provided FlowEventStore, and TraceMaps to the provided TraceMapRepository.
      static <T> FlowCompiler makeCompiler(FlowHistoryRepository<T> repository, FlowVisitor<Action> visitor)
      Create a FlowCompiler that will compile Flows to FlowExecutions that will record FlowEvents to the provided FlowHistoryRepository on execution.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createInMemoryRepository

        public static <T> FlowHistoryRepository<T> createInMemoryRepository(EventDataSerialiser<T> serialiser)
        Create an in-memory FlowHistoryRepository using the provided EventDataSerialiser to serialise flow event data.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type to which flow event data will be serialised.
        Parameters:
        serialiser - The serialiser to use to serialise flow event data.
        Returns:
        The constructed flow history repository.

      • createRepository

        public static <T> FlowHistoryRepository<T> createRepository(FlowEventStore<T> eventStore,
                                                            EventDataSerialiser<T> serialiser,
                                                            TraceMapRepository traceMapRepository)
        Create a FlowHistoryRepository that will write flow event data serialised with the provided EventDataSerialiser to the provided FlowEventStore, and TraceMaps to the provided TraceMapRepository.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type to which flow event data will be serialised.
        Parameters:
        eventStore - The event store to use to store flow events.
        serialiser - The serialiser to use to serialise flow event data.
        traceMapRepository - The repository to store trace maps in.
        Returns:
        The constructed flow history repository.

      • createRepository

        public static <T> FlowHistoryRepository<T> createRepository(FlowEventRepository<T> eventRepository,
                                                            TraceMapRepository traceMapRepository)
        Create a FlowHistoryRepository that will write flow event data to the provided FlowEventRepository, and TraceMaps to the provided TraceMapRepository.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type to which flow event data will be serialised.
        Parameters:
        eventRepository - The repository to write flow events to.
        traceMapRepository - The repository to write trace maps to.
        Returns:
        The constructed flow history repository.

      • makeCompiler

        public static <T> FlowCompiler makeCompiler(FlowHistoryRepository<T> repository,
                                            FlowVisitor<Action> visitor)
        Create a FlowCompiler that will compile Flows to FlowExecutions that will record FlowEvents to the provided FlowHistoryRepository on execution.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type to which flow event data will be serialised.
        Parameters:
        repository - The repository to which events will be written.
        visitor - The visitor to use to compile Flows into executable Actions.
        Returns:
        The constructed flow compiler.
